>>Weather Heber City

The climate in Heber City is cold and temperate. The city of Heber City experiences a significant amount of rainfall, even during the month with historically low precipitation levels. Köppen and Geiger classify this climate as Dfa. The temperature here averages 7.2 °C | 45.0 °F. Approximately 751 mm | 29.6 inch of rainfall occurs on a yearly basis.

Heber City is in the northern hemisphere. -> It is situated in the upper half of the planet. Summer begins in September and ends at the end of June. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Heber City

The driest month is July. There is 32 mm | 1.3 inch of precipitation in July. The majority of rainfall occurs during the month with the highest precipitation, which is January, and has an average amount of 83 mm | 3.3 inch.

average temperature by month Heber City

With an average of 23.0 °C | 73.4 °F, July is the warmest month. During the month of December, the mean temperature registers at a minimum value of -5.8 °C | 21.5 °F. This represents the coldest monthly average throughout the entire year.

The precipitation varies 51 mm | 2 inch between the driest month and the wettest month. Throughout the year, there is a fluctuation in average temperatures by 28.8 °C | 51.9 °F.

The month of highest relative humidity is December (76.74 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (37.94 %). The month which sees the most rainfall is May (5.77 days). The driest month of the year is July (12.50 days).

Hours of sunshine in Heber City

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Heber City, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 12.94 hours of sunshine. In total there are 401 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month exhibiting the least number of daily sunshine hours in Heber City is January, presenting an average of only 5.6 hours per day. The total accumulation of sunlight during this period amounts to approximately 173.53.

Around 3312.49 hours of sunshine are counted in Heber City throughout the year. On average there are 108.74 hours of sunshine per month.
